comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: whatsthatpicture has suggested geotags for this image - view the suggestion on the Commons Tagr app. If you're the image owner, login to approve the suggestion and add/update the location on Flickr.

comment.author: 26808453@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/whatsthatpicture] Approved. Really nice app, James - has it had much take up by The Commons community?
- Emma
